　　Stephanie Beatriz is an actress and producer, known for Brooklyn Nine-Nine (2013), Short Term 12 (2013) and You're Not You (2014).　　Trivia (5)　　Born in Neuquen, Argentina and moved to the U.S. at the age of three.　　Raised in Webster, Texas.　　Her father is Colombian-American of German and Dutch descent and her mother is Bolivian-American of Basque and Spanish descent.　　Is extremely nearsighted and wears very thick glasses when not on camera.　　Has a small signature scar on her right eyebrow, caused by unfortunately tripping on Lego when she was 10.
